results.title: Patty Jenkins on ‘Wonder Woman 1984’ and the Future of Theaters
results.abstract: Jenkins made history with a lucrative deal to direct this sequel. With Warner Bros. opting to debut it on HBO Max, will she come back for a third film? “We’ll see.”

multimedia.caption: The director said of her difficult contract talks for this sequel: “I wanted to get paid at least as much as people who have done less well with their first superhero movies.”

results.title: What to Watch: Sci-Fi Movies Led by Women
results.abstract: Aliens aren't all these heroes have to contend with. Check out these films with women at the forefront.
She went from bubbly sex symbol in the “Carry On” films to working-class hero on “EastEnders.” Her private life was often as troubled as her “EastEnders” character’s.

multimedia.caption: The actress Barbara Windsor at the British Academy Television Awards in London in 2009. She was a star of the series “EastEnders” on and off from 1994 to 2016.

Film Academy Museum Delays Its Opening Again
results.abstract: The Academy Museum of Motion Pictures pushed back its opening to Sept. 30, 2021, from April 30, citing the difficulty of forecasting when public life may begin to normalize.
